amendment.description: An amendment numbered 198 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibt the Department of Veterans Affairs from interfering with a veterans participation in a state medical cannabis program, denying a veteran who participates in a state medical cannabis program from being denied VA services, and interfering with the ability of VA health care providers to recommend participation in state medical cannabis programs.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Blumenauer amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A071) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
